> NOTE: The DataX Process exists code
exit with 0: Job succeed
exit with 1: Job failed
exit with 2: Job failed, e.g. connetion interrupted, if we try to rerun it in a few seconds, it may succeed.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Program entry
> NOTE: The DataX Process exists code
exit with 0: Job succeed
exit with 1: Job failed
exit with 2: Job failed, e.g. connetion interrupted, if we try to rerun it in a few seconds, it may succeed.

抛出：
java.lang.Exception
